#### Frequently Used Terminal Commands

1. open folder in terminal : $\texttt{nautilus}$

2. join into server : $\texttt{ssh -X [username@servername]}$

3. logout from server: $\texttt{Ctrl+D}$

4. nice jobs: $\texttt{bash; nice -n 19 bash}$

5. mount folders of ssh servers to local directories: $\texttt{sudo apt install sshfs} ;$ 

    $\texttt{sshfs [username@servername] server-directory local-directory}$
